org.alienideology.jcord.handle.channel

Interface IChannelManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ChannelManager

    public interface IChannelManager
    IChannelManager - A manager for both text and voice channels.
    Author:
    AlienIdeology

    • Method Detail

      • getIdentity

        Identity getIdentity()
        Get the identity this channel manager belongs to.
        Returns:
        The identity.

      • getGuild

        IGuild getGuild()
        Get the guild this channel manager manages channel from.
        Returns:
        The guild.

      • getGuildChannel

        IGuildChannel getGuildChannel()
        Get the channel this channel manager manages.
        Returns:
        The channel. Can be ITextChannel or IVoiceChannel.

      • modifyName

        void modifyName(java.lang.String name)
        Modify the name of this channel.
        Parameters:
        name - The new name.
        Throws:
        PermissionException -
        • If the identity do not have Manage Channels permission.
        • If the name is shorter than 2 or longer than 100.

      • modifyPosition

        void modifyPosition(int position)
        Modify the position of this channel. The position of a channel can be calculated by counting down the channel list, starting from 1. Note that voice channels is a separate list than text channels in a guild.
        Parameters:
        position - The new position.
        Throws:
        PermissionException - If the identity do not have Manage Channels permission.
        See Also:
        If the {@code position} is 0, then it will be the first in the channel list. Use {@link IGuild#getTextChannels()} or {@link IGuild#getVoiceChannels()}, then {@link List#size()} to get the last position in the channel list. Note that there are no limits to the position. If the position is too small or large, no exception will be thrown. The channel will simply by placed at the start or the end of the channel list, respectively.

      • moveChannelBy

        void moveChannelBy(int amount)
        Moves the channel by an amount of positions. Use a negative amount to move the channel up.
        Parameters:
        amount - The offset, or amount of channels to move by.
        See Also:
        modifyPosition(int)

      • modifyTopic

        void modifyTopic(java.lang.String topic)
        Modify the topic of a ITextChannel. It is important to understand that this method will only work for text channels. Use empty or null topic parameter to reset the topic to none.
        Parameters:
        topic - The new topic.
        Throws:
        PermissionException - If the identity do not have Manage Channels permission.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException -
        • If the channel manager manages a IVoiceChannel.
        • If the topic is longer than 2014.

      • modifyBitrate

        void modifyBitrate(int bitrate)
        Modify the bitrate of a IVoiceChannel. Note that this method will only work for voice channels. If the guild is a normal guild, the bitrate cannot be higher than 96000. If the guild is a VIP guild, then the bitrate limit is 128000.
        Parameters:
        bitrate - The new bitrate.
        Throws:
        PermissionException - If the identity do not have Manage Channels permission.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException -
        • If the channel manager manages a ITextChannel.
        • If the bitrate is smaller than 8000.
        • The bitrate exceeds the limit. (For normal guild, the limit is 96000. For VIP guild, the limit is 128000.
        See Also:
        For more information on bitrate., Normal guilds' splash will always be null.

      • modifyUserLimit

        void modifyUserLimit(int limit)
        Modify the user limit of a IVoiceChannel. This method will only work for voice channels. Use 0 for no user limits. Note that negative limits will throw IllegalArgumentException.
        Parameters:
        limit - The new limit.
        Throws:
        PermissionException - If the identity do not have Manage Channels permission.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException -
        • If the channel manager manages a ITextChannel.
        • If the bitrate is smaller than 0 or greater than 99.
        See Also:
        For more information on user limit.

      • deleteChannel

        void deleteChannel()
        Deletes the guild channel.
        Throws:
        PermissionException - If the identity do not have Manage Channels permission.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the channel is a text channel, and if the text channel is a default channel.
        See Also:
        For more information.
